app.title: Recipe Keeper
app.description: Your personal dashboard for organizing, searching, and sharing recipes.

myRecipes.title: My Recipes
myRecipes.description: Access all the recipes you’ve created or saved from the community.

favorites.title: Favorite Recipes

tags.title: Manage Tags
tags.description: Customize and organize your tags to easily filter and find recipes.

tagsSuggest.title: Tag Suggestions
tagsSuggest.description: Suggest new tags to help organize recipes

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Update your profile, preferences, and manage your account settings.
